pdhp358:2: virāgo śreṣṭho dhammāṇāṁ dupadānāṁ ca cakkhumā ।।
pdhp359:1: ākkhāto vo mayā māggo aṁñāye śallasaṁsano ।
pdhp360:3: etāhi tubbhe paṭipannā dukkhassa antaṁ kariṣyatha ।।
pdhp361:1: vanaṁ chindatha mā rukkhe vanāto jāyate bhayaṁ ।
pdhp361:2: chettā vanañ ca vanadhañ ca nibbanena gamiśśatha ।।
pdhp362:1: yāvatā vanadho na cchijjati aṇumātto pi narassa ñātisu ।
pdhp362:2: paṭibaddhamano hi tattha so vaccho cchīravako va mātari ।।
pdhp363:1: ucchinna sineham āttano kumudaṁ śāradikaṁ va pāṇinā ।
pdhp363:2: śāntimāggam eva byūhaya nibbāṇaṁ sugatena deśitaṁ ।।
pdhp364:1: idaṁ vaśśā kariṣyāmi idaṁ hemaṁna gṛhmasu ।
pdhp364:2: iti bālo viciṁteti antarāyaṁ na bujjhati ।।
pdhp365:2: suttaṁ ggrāmaṁ mahogho vā maccu-r-ādāya gacchati ।।
pdhp366:1: na santi puttā ttāṇāya na pitā no pi bhātaro ।
pdhp367:1: krandatām eva ñātīnaṁ vilapatāṁ cevam ekato ।
pdhp368:2: taṁ saggagamanaṁ māggaṁ niccam eva viśodhaye ।
pdhp369:1: tassā hi paṇḍito poṣo saṁpaśśaṁ attham āttano ।
pdhp369:2: taṁ saggaganaṁ māggaṁ niccam eva viśodhaye ।।
pdhp372:2: saṁyojanam aṇutthūlaṁ daham aggī va gacchati ।
pdhp373:2: atha nivvaṇḍate dukkhā esa māggo viśuddhiye ।।
pdhp374:1: sabbadhaṁmā anāttā ti yato praṁñāya paśśati ।
pdhp374:2: atha nivvaṇḍate dukkhā esa māggo viśuddhiye ।।
pdhp375:1: yogā hi bhūrī saṁbhavati ayogā bhūrisaṁkhayo ।
pdhp375:2: etaṁ jethāpathaṁ ñāttā bhavāya vibhavāya ca ।
pdhp375:3: tathā śiccheya medhāvī yathā bhūrī pravaddhati ।।
